page.title: 04NEWS IN DAGENHAM
page.content: We looked at four weeks of Dagenham{ {newspapers}in the months of May and June. We found much of the news was{ {crime,}especially theft. Two men clambered over garden fences to take two guinea pigs from someones garden. Damage also filled quite a bit of the local papers. A{cruel sport}of breeding Bull Terriors and making them fight against each other until one of them is{killed.}People bet on the dog that they think is going to live. There is not only bad news, there's also{good news.}One story is of a mother who meets her daughter after 40 years. Lately there have been many fun marathon races which have been run for {charity}. Very recently 697 people entered a 13 mile (half marathon)race for charity.
